column4: is there a 'disk manager' in ubuntu 6.10? i seem to remember something like that in 6.06 but i cant find it in 6.10
Places -> home folder, then up up, and I am at something that looks like a system explorer
i mean a utility that let you see drives/partitions
i think it was just called 'Disks' and it was in Administration but its not there..
